title: [Question] Help me with this MCA admission situation.
content:
Ques 1) I have the PES account but I did not initiated the payment process because I was told that the registration process was over. If I do this now do I have a chance.

Ques 2) Is there a possibility that it's too late and many students who have registered might have already switched to other colleges and I may have a chance for getting that seat?

Please answer both the queries.

comments.body: Bro the waitlist itself started months ago i doubt they'll be seats left just mail them once on @admissionssupportpesu
I already tried that, it's just a automated response. Also tried calling them but they just don't even listen and says that registration is closed.
yeah bro its probably closed they started taking the pessat interviewers since jan/feb from may the waitlist already started
